verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> don't<WH3198> rebuke me in your wrath,<WH7110> neither chasten<WH3256> me in your hot displeasure.<WH2534>
For your arrows<WH2671> have pierced<WH5181> me,<WH3027> your hand presses hard on me.<WH5181>
There is no soundness<WH4974> in my flesh<WH1320> because<WH6440> of your indignation,<WH2195> neither is there any health<WH7965> in my bones<WH6106> because<WH6440> of my sin.<WH2403>
For my iniquities<WH5771> have gone over<WH5674> my head.<WH7218> As a heavy<WH3515> burden,<WH4853> they are too heavy for me.<WH3515>
My wounds<WH2250> are loathsome<WH887> and corrupt,<WH4743> because<WH6440> of my foolishness.<WH200>
I am pained<WH5753> and bowed down<WH7817> greatly.<WH3966> I go<WH1980> mourning<WH6937> all day long.<WH3117>
For my waist<WH3689> is filled<WH4390> with burning.<WH7033> There is no soundness<WH4974> in my flesh.<WH1320>
I am faint<WH6313> and severely<WH3966> bruised.<WH1794> I have groaned<WH7580> by reason of the anguish<WH5100> of my heart.<WH3820>
Lord,<WH136> all my desire<WH8378> is before you.<WH585> My groaning is not hidden from you.<WH5641>
My heart<WH3820> throbs.<WH5503> My strength<WH3581> fails<WH5800> me.<WH216> As for the light of my eyes,<WH5869> it<WH1992> has also left me.<WH369>
My lovers<WH157> and my friends<WH7453> stand<WH5975> aloof from<WH5048> my plague.<WH5061> My kinsmen<WH7138> stand<WH5975> far away.<WH7350>

They also who seek<WH1245> after my life<WH5315> lay snares.<WH5367> Those who seek<WH1875> my hurt<WH7451> speak<WH1696> mischievous things,<WH1942> and meditate<WH1897> deceits<WH4820> all day long.<WH3117>
But I,<WH2795> as a deaf man,<WH8085> don't hear. I am as a mute man<WH483> who doesn't<WH6605> open his mouth.<WH6310>
Yes,<WH376> I am as a man who doesn't<WH8085> hear, in whose mouth<WH6310> are no reproofs.<WH8433>
For in you,<WH3068> Yahweh, do I hope.<WH3176> You will answer,<WH6030> Lord<WH136> my God.<WH430>
For I said,<WH559> "Don't<WH8055> let them gloat over me,<WH1431> or exalt themselves over me when my foot<WH7272> slips.<WH4131>"
For I am ready<WH3559> to fall.<WH6761> My pain<WH4341> is continually before me.<WH8548>
For I will declare<WH5046> my iniquity.<WH5771> I will be sorry<WH1672> for my sin.<WH2403>
But my enemies<WH341> are vigorous<WH2416> and many.<WH6105> Those who hate<WH8130> me without reason<WH8267> are numerous.<WH7231>
They who also render<WH7999> evil<WH7451> for good<WH2896> are adversaries<WH7853> to me,<WH7291> because I follow what is good.<WH2896>
Don't<WH5800> forsake me,<WH3068> Yahweh. My God,<WH430> don't<WH7368> be far from me.
Hurry<WH2363> to help<WH5833> me,<WH136> Lord, my salvation.<WH8668>
